name: Last Stand Crossing
description:
Description

Third-Person Zombie Shooter in an apocalyptic set up

Last Stand Crossing is a game where the player is facing endless waves of zombies that he needs to kill to survive. The objective is to survive the most rounds as possible. This project's focus was on learning animation rigging and animation Blend Tree setups.

How To Play
  • Kill enemies to increase your score before you run out of health or out of time;
  • You start with 99 seconds and you gain 10 more seconds every time you kill 5 enemies.
Controls
  • Use "WASD" or "Arrow Keys" to move and hold "Left Shift" to sprint;
  • Aim with the "Mouse", zoom with "Right Mouse Button" and shoot with the "Left Mouse Button";
  • Press "R" to reload( be careful, while reloading you won't be able to move).
